name: Surajkund
description: 10th-century sun reservoir built by Tomar king, amphitheater-like structure, annual Surajkund International Crafts Mela showcasing Indian handicrafts, cultural performances, traditional artisans.

name: Sultanpur National Park
description: Bird sanctuary with 250+ species, migratory birds from Siberia and Europe, wetland ecosystem, Greater Flamingos, Siberian Cranes, watchtowers, nature trails, photography spot near Delhi.

name: Kurukshetra
description: Land of Bhagavad Gita, site of epic Mahabharata war, Brahma Sarovar, Jyotisar, Sheikh Chilli's Tomb, Kurukshetra Panorama and Science Centre, sacred pilgrimage city.

name: Brahma Sarovar
description: Ancient sacred water tank created by Lord Brahma, solar eclipse bathing rituals, Gita Jayanti celebrations, Sarveshwar Mahadev Temple, 1800 feet long and 1400 feet wide tank.

name: Jyotisar (Krishna Janmabhoomi)
description: Exact spot where Lord Krishna delivered Bhagavad Gita to Arjuna, ancient banyan tree marking the site, marble chariot sculpture, sacred pilgrimage site, Mahabharata connection.

name: Pinjore Gardens
description: Yadavindra Gardens, 17th-century Mughal-style terraced garden, seven levels, fountains, historic architecture, Mini Zoo, Japanese Garden, Rajendra Park nearby, Shivalik foothills.

name: Morni Hills
description: Only hill station in Haryana at 1,220m, twin lakes Tikkar Taal, Morni Fort, adventure activities, trekking, paragliding, rock climbing, Shivalik range, peaceful retreat near Chandigarh.

name: Bhindawas Bird Sanctuary
description: Largest wetland in Haryana, 250+ bird species, migratory birds including demoiselle cranes, Greater Flamingos, Sarus cranes, birdwatching paradise, watchtowers, nature trails.

name: Asola Bhatti Wildlife Sanctuary
description: Northern Ridge extension on Delhi-Haryana border, 32.7 sq km, leopards, jackals, porcupines, 193 bird species, rock formations, hiking trails, eco-tourism, green lung near NCR.

name: Badkhal Lake
description: Artificial lake surrounded by Aravalli hills, picnic spot, boating (when water levels permit), adventure park nearby, nature walks, weekend getaway from Delhi NCR.

name: Tilyar Lake
description: Scenic lake with mini zoo, zoo safari, boating, children's park, musical fountain, eco-tourism destination, Tilyar Forest, recreation complex with accommodation facilities.

name: Farrukhnagar Fort
description: 18th-century fort built by Faujdar Khan, Mughal and Rajput architecture, seven gates, Jama Masjid, Sheesh Mahal, palaces, baolis (stepwells), historical significance in NCR region.

name: Rewari Heritage Steam Locomotive Museum
description: India's only steam locomotive museum, vintage steam engines from British era, railway heritage, working locomotives, Fairy Queen (world's oldest running steam locomotive), rail enthusiast destination.

name: Chokhi Dhani Village Experience
description: Ethnic village resort showcasing Rajasthani culture, traditional food, folk dances, puppet shows, camel rides, village ambiance, cultural performances, handicrafts, family entertainment.

name: Shatavar Mahadev Temple
description: Ancient Shiva temple in Shivalik foothills, natural cave temple, Maha Shivratri celebrations, peaceful spiritual atmosphere, trekking to reach temple, mythological significance.

name: Surajkund Mela
description: Surajkund International Crafts Mela, Asia's largest crafts fair, showcasing handicrafts from all Indian states and international participation, folk performances, traditional cuisine, cultural extravaganza.

name: International Mango Festival (Karnal)
description: Annual mango festival showcasing 500+ mango varieties from India and abroad, tasting sessions, mango competitions, fruit exhibitions, agricultural innovations, cultural programs celebrating king of fruits.
